txt.en:
'I am here to help you learn about becoming a more powerful Champion. As you gain levels, more skills will be available for you to unleash upon your foes.

'Use your new skill <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> against a Training Dummy.'

HINT:

Champions rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Fervour</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Swift Strike</rgb> skill to build <rgb=#ffff00>2 Fervour</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Targeting Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> skill.
'Good, [placeholder]! I think you will be an excellent Champion someday. You should return now to Elladan; I believe he wishes to begin the investigation.'

'Use your new skill to strike the Training Dummy.'

HINT:

Champions rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Fervour</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Swift Strike</rgb> skill to build <rgb=#ffff00>2 Fervour</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Targeting Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> skill.
Training: The Thrill of the Fight
As you gain levels, you acquire new skills to help you develop into a more powerful Champion.
You have struck the Training Dummy with 'Savage Strikes'
Learn the skill 'Savage Strikes' and use it against a Training Dummy

Use your new skill <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> on the training-dummy nearby. \n\nHINT: Champions rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Fervour</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Savage Strikes</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Swift Strike</rgb> skill to build <rgb=#ffff00>2 Fervour</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Targeting Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Savage Strikes</rgb> skill.
Talk to the Champion Trainer at the Edhelion Watch
The Champion Trainer is at the Edhelion Watch.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill, return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
